actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States with respect to the tariff treatment accorded to sheets manufactured from acrylic resin materials.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to set forth the customs duty on acrylic resin sheets and to exclude from tariff classification as rubber and plastics scrap or profile shapes such scrap or shapes improved by grinding on the edges, drilling, milling, hemming, or otherwise processing for a useful commercial purpose.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States with respect to the tariff treatment accorded to sheets manufactured from acrylic resin materials.
